Articles.Content: The pins are kind of self resetting.
Better when you do it with a plane. 8)

Better when you do it with a plane. 8)

I do my kerbowling via re-entry direct from orbit, none of your wishy-washy planey-waney things there, thank you.

On second thoughts, there should be a challenge to re-enter a capsule onto a group of EVA-ing kerbals.
There seems to be a lot of sadist humor with the new update. Which I\'m D\'Ling as we speak.

hmmmmmmmm, I have alot on my agenda now:

-Kerbowling

-Monster Rover, hehe simply having a huge ass rover going over a set of landers/kerbals, very very closely.

-Kerbal Rocket launching (Saw this one in a video, a guy had a huge engine pointing up and a kerbal walked into it, the kerbal flew high up and then.. well you\'d know the rest)

-Mun arch climbing, and passing a heck tonn of things through the arch (from smallest to biggest, heeheh).

-Kerbal Sundiving, and watching closely what the kraken does to a kerbal.

-Landing on Minmus with a kerbal, and then with another kerbal already on Minmus, attempt a reentry to Kerbin.

You guys got any more suggestions for my sadistic appetite? Muahuahuahuah.
the most awesome kerbal skydive you can think of
I\'ve had no luck with braking with just the backpack. Is there any way that you can increase the power of the EVA pack, or make the kerbal more crash resistant?

if what I\'ve heard is true.. you can position upside down rocket engines with tons of fuel and have their thrust push the kerbal upwords, breaking his otherwise fatal fall. This would be almost impossible.

God speed.
